Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of prophet (נָבִיא) Jonah (יֹונָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= town; ◄ located in northern Mesopotamia near Mosul on the east bank of the Tigris (חִדֶּקֶל) ► built by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) after the flood (מַבּוּל) ancient capital of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) preached against by the prophet Jonah (יֹונָה)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
literally: to come up: hence: = process by which a certain sound or information reaches the ears of someone located in a high place
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► sea port
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= a fixed regular payment for work, either with money or in kind; ≈ by extension: all that happens in return for one's actions

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to hurl; hence: = causative action by which a deity causes an event to happen with force

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= process by which a strong wind blows, ► causing danger and destruction and inspiring fear; ≈ often associated with the appearance and intervention of God and used as a symbol of warfare
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= action by which humans exercise their mind (לֵב) with the purpose of achieving something

Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= a person who works as a member of the crew of ship or boat
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans throw an object in a certain direction, often with force

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= causative action by which humans reduce the intensity of a situation
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)

= the part of an object or area that is the furthest away from the perspective of the speaker or narrator
= boat with a covered deck and a hold underneath; ◄ of a relatively large size; ► able to sail the sea or ocean

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

Node.gloss: to lie in a deep sleep
Node.definition: = state in which humans are deeply asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
literally: great one; hence: = someone in a position of authority at a royal court or on a ship
= person; ► works on a ship

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
